home.title: Орион-Транс — Железнодорожные перевозки, расчет тарифов и экспедирование грузов
home.description: Организация железнодорожных перевозок в Кыргызстане и по всему миру. Рассчитайте тариф, выберите контейнерные перевозки или получите экспедиторские услуги от Орион-Транс.

services.title: Услуги Орион-Транс — Международные железнодорожные перевозки и логистика
services.description: Орион-Транс предоставляет услуги железнодорожных перевозок, расчет тарифов, экспедирование грузов и предоставление подвижного состава. Закажите услугу онлайн!

about.title: О компании Орион-Транс — Лидер железнодорожной логистики с 15-летним опытом
about.description: С 2010 года Орион-Транс предлагает железнодорожные грузоперевозки, расчет тарифов и консультации. 15 лет опыта, 200+ компаний доверяют нам. Узнайте, почему!

clients.title: Клиенты и партнеры Орион-Транс — Доверие лидеров отрасли
clients.description: Наши клиенты — лидеры в своих отраслях, а партнеры — официальные представители железных дорог. Узнайте, почему компании выбирают Орион-Транс.

blogs.title: Блог Орион-Транс — Статьи о логистике и железнодорожных перевозках
blogs.description: Читайте статьи и новости о современных решениях в логистике и железнодорожных перевозках. Орион-Транс делится опытом и аналитикой.

contact.title: Контакты Орион-Транс — Свяжитесь с лидером железнодорожной логистики
contact.description: Свяжитесь с Орион-Транс для расчета тарифов, организации грузоперевозок и получения консультации. Звоните или отправьте заявку онлайн.

career.title: Карьера в Орион-Транс — Работа в лидирующей логистической компании
career.description: Присоединяйтесь к команде Орион-Транс! Мы предлагаем возможности для профессионального роста, комфортные условия работы и сильную корпоративную культуру.

section6.subtitle: Meet the team

section1.title: We are Orion-Trans Providing You with the most actionable Rail Freight Service
section1.subtitle: We are professional logistics specialists with a passion for quality and efficiency. We believe in integrity, trust, and continuous improvement. We promise to listen and provide You with reliable freight forwarding services over the globe.

section2.subtitle1: Orion-Trans is an international modern company of rail freight forwarding services, based in Kyrgyzstan, Bishkek. We met up to make logistics services in more than 20 nations over the globe and have been operating on the market since 2010, thereby have proved to our clients and partners our level of professionalism in the logistics field.
section2.subtitle2: Countries we're carrying out international freight forwarding services:

section3.title: What we offer
section3.subtitle1: We offer to our clients the most actionable solutions in freight-forwarding services. Our team of professional logistics specialists will develop a plan of the whole transportation arrangement for your business.
section3.subtitle2: We will calculate for you all of the necessary rail freight-forwarding tariffs across more than 20 countries, by import, export, transit and internal consignment and find for you a needed rolling stock to ship your cargo.

section4.subtitle1: To provide businesses with all the essential transport and freight forwarding services available in the market, continuously improving the quality of services and the approach to executing tasks.
section4.subtitle2: We aim to become leaders in railway logistics by offering a complete range of services and enhancing the comfort and conditions for our employees.

section5.subtitle: To organize the entire process of railway logistics – safely and efficiently, implementing modern technologies. Our goal is also to build a strong corporate culture that supports both the professional development and well-being of our employees.
objectives: Build effective partnerships with railways and logistics companies.
Improve the speed and quality of customer service, promptly addressing their needs.
Train and develop employees to enhance their qualifications.
Continuously improve working conditions within the company.
Implement innovations to create more efficient logistics solutions.

section1.title:
{{item}},
who trust us

selectedClients.title: clients
selectedClients.subtitle: Our clients are leaders in their industries who trust us with important and responsible tasks, including organizing rail freight transportation and freight forwarding. We value their choice and always strive to meet their expectations by offering optimal business solutions and ensuring reliability, safety, and efficiency at every stage of transportation.

selectedPartners.title: partners
selectedPartners.subtitle: Our partners include official railway representatives and the railways themselves, such as Russian Railways (RZD), Kazakhstan Temir Zholy (KTZ), Kyrgyz Temir Jolu and Tajikistan Railways, with whom we maintain long-term and reliable relationships. In addition, we actively collaborate with leading railways’ representatives, which are Uzbekistan, Iran, Afghanistan, Giorgia, Azerbaijan and other regions, who trust us, enabling us to efficiently address any challenges and ensure the reliability and effectiveness of transportation services.

section1.subtitle: The use of railroads and trains to convey cargo on land is known as rail freight transport. Rail transport is popular, especially in continents with extensive journey durations, such as China, Russia, the United States and Europe. Freight trains can transport a variety of cargo, including freight containers, automobiles, cattle, grains, coal, minerals and metals. Bulk goods, standardized shipping containers, or particularly constructed carriages for a specific sort of freight can all be transported by freight trains. Rail freight travels far more quickly than ocean freight. It costs more than sea freight, but less than air freight. Moving high-value industrial products like automobiles, electronics, and computer equipment, as well as promotional items, by train is ideal.
